title: Love of My Life
overview: The Gonzales family is not like any other, Isabella, the matriarch, is a rich widow with high standards who would stop at nothing to get what's best for her family. Nikolai, her youngest son, has grown into a rebellious man after causing a traumatic family accident which led to the death of his father. Stefano, the favorite son, is a family-oriented architect who fathers the child of Kelly, his former lover who holds a vengeful heart due to what she has been through in the name of love. When Stefano crosses paths with Adelle, a widow with a child who manages her own handicraft business, things begin to get better.
